items.name: Light Orb
items.descrip: A spherical structure that emits diffused white light when activated.

items.name: Charging Block
items.descrip: A device that charges your Chip. Attatched to it is a long cord. Don't forget to plug in before you go to bed!

items.name: Body Cleanser
items.descrip: A device that cleanses your body.

items.name: Eliminator
items.descrip: A place to eliminate bodily waste.
